collection:
This Privacy Policy outlines how we collect, use, and
safeguard your information when you use our app.

* Information Collection:

  * We collect logs to enhance the quality of our answers and improve the performance of our app.
sharing:
* Data Sharing:

  * Completely anonymized data in aggregate format only is shared with Johns Hopkins and George Washington University, and may also be shared with other reputable researchers working to combat long covid.
This data sharing is solely for research purposes and contributes to the global effort to understand and address long covid.

* Data Selling and Sharing:

  * We do not sell or share your personal data with any third parties for marketing or commercial purposes or for any other purpose

  * Consent:

  * By using the Wellness XYZ app, you consent to our Privacy Policy and agree to its terms.
